TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputSubmit extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
type HtmlInputSubmit = class inherit HtmlInputButton interface IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並且可用來建立送出表單的網頁上的按鈕控制項。The class is derived from the class and is used to create a button control on a Web page that submits a form. 控制項則通常搭配控制項，將表單控制項重設為其初始值。The control is often used with the control, which resets form controls to their initial values. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用``以宣告方式在 Web Form 網頁的 HTML 控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `` HTML control declaratively on a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/CS/htmlinputcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/VB/htmlinputvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何在呼叫期間，以程式設計方式加入同一個 HTML 控制項`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to add the same HTML control programmatically during a call to the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||「 送出 「 常值字串。The "submit" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入， ，和使用預設建構函式來建立簡單 登入畫面 Web Form 網頁的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add , , and controls to a Web Forms page using default constructors to create a simple login screen. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`type` 參數的值。The value of the `type` parameter.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入， ，和控制項到 Web Form 頁面，以建立簡單 登入畫面。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add , , and controls to a Web Forms page to create a simple login screen. 這個範例會示範如何將不同的值傳遞`type`參數，會覆寫內建 HTML 控制項的類型。This example demonstrates how you can pass various values for the `type` parameter, which overrides the intrinsic type of the HTML control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_3/CS/htmlinput3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_3/VB/htmlinput3vb.aspx#1)]
